items.text: Whales are giant ocean mammals that come in all shapes and sizes, making them a super diverse group!
Did you know that dolphins and porpoises are part of the whale family? They’re like the fun cousins of the whale world!
Whales can be found in oceans all around the globe, from chilly Arctic waters to warm tropical seas!
